mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MM_PKG_BOX (ID, FACTORY_CODE, BOX_CODE, BOX_TYPE, PACK_LENGTH, PACK_WIDTH, PACK_HEIGHT, STATUS, CREATION_USER) VALUES (SEQ_MM_PKG_BOX.NEXTVAL, #{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packWidth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID id, A.BOX_CODE boxCode, B.CODE_VALUE boxType, C.CODE_VALUE status, B.CODE_VALUE_NAME boxTypeName, C.CODE_VALUE_NAME statusName, A.PACK_LENGTH packLength, A.PACK_WIDTH packWidth, A.PACK_HEIGHT packHeight FROM MM_PKG_BOX A LEFT JOIN MM_PUB_DATA_DICT B ON A.BOX_TYPE=B.CODE_VALUE AND B.CODE_TYPE='INV_BOX_TYPE' LEFT JOIN MM_PUB_DATA_DICT C ON A.STATUS=C.CODE_VALUE AND C.CODE_TYPE='PUB_IS_ENABLE' WHERE A.ID = #{id}

SELECT A.ID id, A.BOX_CODE boxCode, A.BOX_TYPE boxType, A.PACK_LENGTH packLength, A.PACK_WIDTH packWidth, A.PACK_WIDTH packWidth, A.PACK_HEIGHT packHeight, A.STATUS status FROM MM_PKG_BOX A WHERE BOX_CODE= #{boxCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE MM_PKG_BOX SET PACK_LENGTH = #{packLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_WIDTH = #{packWidth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_HEIGHT = #{packHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED_USER = #{lastModifiedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.ID id, A.BOX_CODE boxCode, A.BOX_TYPE boxType, A.PACK_LENGTH packLength, A.PACK_WIDTH packWidth, A.PACK_HEIGHT packHeight, A.STATUS status FROM MM_PKG_BOX A WHERE 1 = 1
AND STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT D.CODE_VALUE value, D.CODE_VALUE_NAME label FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT D WHERE D.CODE_TYPE = 'PKG_BOX_TYPE' AND D.FACTORY_CODE = #{factoryCode} AND D.CODE_VALUE_NAME != '其他'
